title: Taric's New Hammer
body:
New PBE Update added Taric's Hammer as one of the items in the Shopkeepers Ship-thing. 

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZX-SydA8SAs/Vud3fWuoGPI/AAAAAAAA40s/2xWV-gmU8CMBAJZYjkkXmykF3kle0bHng/s1600/tar.jpg

_**OUTRAGEOUS **_

Looks a little more space-y and tech-y then I expected.

replies.body: And so the journey begins....

*OOOOOOOH YEEEEEEEES*

*If you have spotted my hammer, that only means one thing*

*You're excited for the premiere of my rework*

*How rude...*

*Lucky for you, I've been aching to show it off for a long time*

*As a reward, I will make your last living moments...*

{{champion:44}} ***...ABSOLUTELY OUTRAGEOUS.***{{champion:44}}
+1 for fantastic use of Undertale reference
If they made a Mettaton-based skin for Taric, I'd die a happy man.
Glittercast Taric
_WITH GEMS LIKE THESE WHO NEEDS HAMMERS ?_
but in his recall animation, he should eat spaghetti
It's perfect...

what i say to all the flamers(just had one Tristana call Draven a noob champ):

It's a beautiful day outside
on days like this kids like you....
+1 man for that awesome reference.
OH! Are you promoting my brand?

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ANBy6JeF,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-15T03:48:46.803+0000)
>
> And so the journey begins....

I can't wait to see 
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Taric_2.jpg

Taric rumored to be an aspect of Targon... so i'm guessing he's the aspect of time.... Hammertime!
Thus the need for a new hammer!
Can't touch dis.

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ANBy6JeF,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-15T03:48:46.803+0000)
>
> And so the journey begins....

Don't do this to us.

Don't you dare tease us like this.
Would you say that it's, magical?
I would say its.....Outrageous!

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ANBy6JeF,comment-id=000200060000,timestamp=2016-03-16T19:12:01.695+0000)
>
> I would say its.....Outrageous!

Truly?

Taric's rework was turned into Yasuo's bro, Yaric. He's a wanderer too, confirmed.


You should probably just spill the beans now, we know.
More like this is the beginning of the end of a long journey.A long & truly,truly outrageous journey.
Just to be clear, this is his current hammer!

> [{quoted}](name=Moobeat,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ANBy6JeF,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-03-15T04:07:28.356+0000)
>
> Just to be clear, this is his current hammer!

Hammer time?

I think that's his old hammer, maybe updated slightly as a way of honoring old Taric.

Though I guess it could look just like his new one.

It is indeed the look of his current, at the time of this writing, hammer. Just with an updated model and textures.

I kinda hope it stays in the shop. Maybe make Taric's Hammer a new icon for the {{item:3022}}.
Yeah, that's the CURRENT hammer.
Can we replace frozen mallet with tarics hammer?

That's Taric's current hammer.

It's in the store barrel as a way of symbolizing that he (and Riot) is getting rid of it, and replacing it with a new weapon, most likely with a very different design direction that's less cartoon-y.

Actually, he might not have a hammer at all in his rework. With {{champion:78}} they majorly down-played her shield and instead put emphasis on her hammer, so changing a champions weapon themes isn't beyond what they're willing to do. I'm not sure how they would go about changing his weapon dynamics, but it's definitely possible.

I KNEW IT!

Taric is going to be a Real Targonian (might be a regal one too :3).

Also that death voiceover...

Well... The current Taric IS from the space... so, it makes sense to the "tech-y"

But this easter makes me wonder in the current Taric will be canon in the new lore or what.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ANBy6JeF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-15T03:20:51.578+0000)
>
> Well... The current Taric IS from the space... so, it makes sense to the "tech-y"
> 
> But this easter makes me wonder in the current Taric will be canon in the new lore or what.

Gotta remember new Taric is an Aspect so hey who knows?

> [{quoted}](name=C9 Feel The Bern,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ANBy6JeF,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-15T05:01:30.835+0000)
>
> Gotta remember new Taric is an Aspect so hey who knows?

The new Taric WILL BE an Aspect*. But the hammer that we see on the picture is from the Current Taric.
It looks like they're retiring another weapon. When Graves lost his gun in the Bildgewater event, he got a brand new gun (and kit) soon after. Could be the same thing here with Taric.

lmao that's his old one man, they dedicate old items that have been retired usually to be decorated at the shop keepers. Kinda like when you use /joke on tahm kench he barfs up the old "Heart of Gold" item that was removed, then eats it up again really fast
That is literally just his hammer as it is now. My theory is that his new one will look vastly different and this addition to the shop is just there as a memento.
Taric no longer uses a hammer
Thats his old hammer... its just visually updated a bit.
most of the items in the ship is removed.

idk I have little faith in VUs and reworks at this point. I think the only decent one was gp, maybe fiora (kit-wise): morde, sion, mf (lol that's a joke fyi), all meh. Can't wait to see how they trash poor triangle-feet Taric. :(

It's exactly the same. 

Not to say the hype isn't real. But it's the same hammer he's always had, take a second look {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I hope the new taric is orange like the sun and from targon.
I will never forgive Riot if they nerf Gems.
I think i was the only one who truly enjoyed playing taric, even played him in rank.  I will miss him, but i hopd they keep his "gems are truly outrageous"

when are the shopkeepers getting vo's?

@roit

Riot be like 

We hear you want something along the line of Traditional skin to retain and help remember the champ before being reworked so we decided to rework and update Taric's hammer and added to the shopkeeper's shop. Oh and just to be clear he won't be having a Traditional skin thank you for reading. 

Sincerely Rito
